name: City Gangs San Andreas
description:
Join City Gangs San Andreas in 30 action well packed missions in his never-ending quest to defeat The BigBoss.
City Gangs San Andreas is a third person shooter where you have to eliminate all opponents, use grenades, rifles, rocket launchers, tanks, helicopter to defeat the enemy.

FEATURES
- 30 missions
- Controllable vehicles, like cars,tanks, helicopters, air fighters and turrets!
- Multiple weapons
- Extra Explosives
- Achievements
- lots of enemies to defeat
- A shop with awesome ingame features like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!!
